data.title: Gauri
data.meta_description: Gauri is a beautiful and unique name for a baby girl, with origins in India. It has a lovely sound and is steadily growing in popularity..
data.text:
Meaning of Gauri

Gauri is a beautiful and unique name for a baby girl. It has its origins in India and is commonly used in Hindi and Marathi-speaking communities. The name Gauri is pronounced as gow-ree (/ɡaʊuˈri/). It has a lovely sound that rolls off the tongue effortlessly. In terms of popularity, Gauri has been steadily growing in popularity in the United States. In recent years, it has appeared on the radar with varying occurrences and ranks. This name carries a sense of elegance and grace, making it a wonderful choice for parents looking for a distinctive and meaningful name for their daughter.

Pronunciation

Indian (Hindi),Indian (Marathi)
